resources.string: EmoCheck App is an AI-powered mental health chatbot designed to provide emotional support, mental well-being resources, and personalized guidance to users. EmoCheck AI Mental Health Chatbot redefines mental health support by bringing an empathetic, intelligent companion to your fingertips, making emotional well-being accessible and achievable for everyone.

Welcome to EmoCheck!
 1. Log In or Sign Up
 Create an account or log in with your existing credentials. Choose guest mode for an anonymous session if available.

 2. Navigate to the Chatbot
 From the Dashboard, tap Chat with EmoCheck to open the chatbot.
 EmoCheck will greet you: Hi there! How are you feeling today?

 3. Start the Conversation
 Select a quick response (e.g., Im stressed) or type your own message to begin.

 4. Engage in Dialogue
 EmoCheck will guide you with empathetic responses and suggestions based on your input.

EmoCheck is a mental health ChatBot App with it main feature for integrating with the user emotion. This app was created and developed in late October 2024 by a team of class 1. Informatics batch 2023 from President University. So without further to do, Hello there! Lets get to know to our team members: 
 -Hana Khairunnisa Nabiilah
 -Nadifah Aulia Rahmani
 -Shofiyyah Abidah Marpaung
